message.content: Avast ye landlubbers! Be ye hearin' 'bout the ChatGPT API? 'Tis a treasure trove for all yer needs! With this bootiful API, ye can now set sail on a grand adventure o' conversational glory! Just send yer messagin' parrot to ChatGPT's servers, and the hallowed AI will reply with wondrous wisdom. Be it tellin' a tale or answerin' questions, it's smooth sailin' all the way. Unlock the power o' ChatGPT's scallywag wit and build yer own chatbots, pirates, creatin' magic! Join the league of API plunderers and embark on an amazin' experience. Trust me, mateys, this be the real deal! Yo ho ho!
